title: Frontend Development
bio: I create frontend projects mainly on React! I design all of my own projects, and I try to build them one step at a time.

title: Backend Development
bio: I create backend projects mainly on Django and Node.js! I specialize on API's and database management!

title: Machine Learning
bio: I love training and making AI models. From Convolutional Neural Networks to Natural Language Processing. I use TensorFlow and PyTorch!
